turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, do you think you can get me a Caffè Mocha at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yea sure, so which Starbucks do you want me to go?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Highland Ave in National City I believe is the closest.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright and what size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmmmm, the grande would be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And do you want any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whipped cream is good

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have 2% Milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you want in your Caffè Mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmmm are there any other flavors I can add?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I don't see any other flavors you can add besides whipped cream

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh ok, I think that is good enough.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You sure? Don't want any pastries?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nah, just the Caffè Mocha will be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright just to double check, you want a grande Caffè Mocha, whipped cream with 2% milk at the Starbucks on Highland Ave in National City?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yup that sounds right

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright I made the order and I'll pick it up in a bit. You should get a text about your recipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool, thanks a lot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, problem.
